channel.title: Nomad problem [PI]
channel.description:
Hey,
Whenever you teleport to Nomad I end up underneath his spawn, It's almost like I've done noclip and walked underneath the earth.
Was wondering if anybody has a solution to this?
Here is the code in ClickingButtons.java [QUOTE]if (c.teleAction == 8) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3258, 9517, 1, "ancient"); c.sendMessage("Approach Nomad with caution.");[/QUOTE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eEGK20w.png[/img]

item.title: Nomad problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDarkSouls ProjectDarkSouls
item.description:
@ProjectDarkSouls wrote:

Hey,

Whenever you teleport to Nomad I end up underneath his spawn, It’s almost like I’ve done noclip and walked underneath the earth.

Was wondering if anybody has a solution to this?

Here is the code in ClickingButtons.java

[QUOTE]if (c.teleAction == 8) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3258, 9517, 1, “ancient”);
c.sendMessage(“Approach Nomad with caution.”);[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
